name: qiita-browser-extensions
description: Web browser extensions for Qiita and Qiita:Team.

scripts.build: npm run build:rm && npm run build:mkdir && npm run build:cp && npm run build:browserify
scripts.build:cp: cp src/chrome/manifest.json dist/chrome/manifest.json && cp src/chrome/html/* dist/chrome/html && cp src/chrome/css/* dist/chrome/css && cp src/chrome/images/* dist/chrome/images
scripts.build:browserify: browserify src/chrome/js/background.js -t babelify -o dist/chrome/js/background.js && browserify src/chrome/js/popup.jsx -t babelify -o dist/chrome/js/popup.js
scripts.build:mkdir: mkdir -p dist/chrome/html && mkdir -p dist/chrome/js && mkdir -p dist/chrome/css && mkdir -p dist/chrome/images
scripts.watch: npm run watch:cp & npm run watch:background & npm run watch:popup
scripts.watch:cp: watch 'npm run build:cp' src/chrome/html src/chrome/css src/chrome/images
